title: Bug 7810Rename on collapsing a tree gives confusing error
description: If you rename a file inline and then collapse it's parent you get an errormessage that saysAssertion failed; Destination should not be under resource's hierarchy..First of all the ; should be a : and there should only be one period.Secondly this is not consistent behaviour. If you hit return the rename happenswithout a problem.STEPS1) Open a folder or file with a parent2) Select rename3) Collapse the parent
